content: Earliest occurrence of Crohn's disease indexed on diagnosis date, for the first time in history; cohort exit is the end of continuous observation.
Included: All occurrences of Crohn's disease (SNOMED CT: 201606) and its descendants.
Time window: 31-365 days after index for second diagnosis code.
Validated across 11 databases. Specificity improved with second diagnosis code requirement, but sensitivity loss precluded use in ASSURE.
